title: How to write an English lesson plan for 10th grade - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey there if you are a teacher then you should know all meaning written in the textbook... But if you are a student then give at least 1 hour to English Prepare the reader portion well you can take help of YouTube also the grammar portion is comparatively lesser so if your basic are cleared then you need not to worry about that... Prioritize your 1 hour as follows Half hour for reader another 15 minutes for grammar …beware of writing section because it's a scoring parts do practice formats of letters article you name it Try the book suggested by your teacher According to me go through holy faith it is the best one Hope it helps Best of luck
